text: Pheri hamile musala'i yasto kitaba pradana gareka thiyaum, juna ramrokama garne manisaharuka lagi pura upahara hos, ra sampurna vastuharubare avasyaka nirdesana hos ra jasama sahi margako sucana ra dayalutako varnana gari'eko hos, jasako karana unaka anuyayiharule aphno palanakartasangako saksatkarama visvasa garun
